entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
